item.title: CS133-lecture-20210208
item.description: UML # Since there isn’t a way to pass a new DisplayPanel object into the constructor, it is a composition. Example CRC card building Clean code # Design principles # “The Art of Clean Code” video # Summary: Victor Rentea’s clean code video had a lot of amazing information for making sure that the code you write is considered “clean.” I think that clean code is a very important part of being a good programmer because it conveys the sense that you care about your team’s ability to read your code.
